name: AdKats
short_description:
Admin Toolset with a plethora of features, ~90 available in-game commands, and many customization options. AdKats focuses on making in-game admins more efficient and accurate at their jobs, with flexibility for almost any setup. Includes a cross-server ban enforcer with advanced enforcement features, metabans support, global admin management, cross-server player messaging, and the BFAdminCP 2.0+ for web-based control has been released. Designed for groups with high-traffic servers and many admins, but will function just as well for small servers.

If you find any bugs, or are looking for enhancements, please submit an issue/request on github and they will be viewed ASAP.

AdKats was inspired by the gaming community A Different Kind (ADK). Visit http://www.adkgamers.com/ to say thanks!

Plugin thread on MyRCON: https://forum.myrcon.com/showthread.php?6045
summary: AdKats - Advanced In-Game Admin for Procon Frostbite (Battlefield 3-4)
